definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The titers of measles virus were determined by standard plaque assays.
sentences.chinese: 標準蝕斑試驗測定麻疹病毒滴度。

sentences.english: The antibody titers must be decreased sufficiently with plasmapheresis.
sentences.chinese: 血漿置換後，這些抗體滴度能夠明顯降低。

sentences.english: The titre of antibodies was determined by ELISA method.
sentences.chinese: 用間接ELISA法檢測免疫家兔產生抗體的滴度。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the associations of the albumin with the toxicity titer.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析白蛋白含量與病毒毒力滴度高低的相關程度。

sentences.english: The observation of ANA titer is helpful for diagnosis of CTD.
sentences.chinese: 滴度的觀察對疾病的診斷有一定的意義。

sentences.english: Hemagglutinin inhibition test was performed to detect titer of antiserum.
sentences.chinese: 通過血凝抑制實驗檢測抗血清的抗體滴度。

sentences.english: Blood samples for viral titers should also be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 血標本和病毒滴度應被採集。

sentences.english: The level of pemphigus antibody decreased.
The results showed that we had gotten the rAAV stocks of high titre .
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，重組病毒有較高的滴度。

definition: potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)/valence (perceived value in psychology)/valency
gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
